CLIENT_BASE_URL.description: URL of running jard client instance (for CORS settings)

SERVER_BASE_URL.description: URL of this jard server instance (for CORS settings) - set after first deploy

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret for signing JSON Web Tokens (used for authentication)

SBA_SECRET.description: Secret for authentication between Spring Boot Admin server and client instances

ROOT_ENABLED.description: Whether the root user should be created when there are no users in database

USER_CONTENT_STORAGE.description: How should the poster uploaded files be stored. Valid options are: LOCAL, AMAZON_S3

AWS_S3_REGION.description: Region of Amazon S3 bucket for storing files

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: Name of Amazon S3 bucket for storing files

AWS_ACCESS_KEY.description: Access key for Amazon Web Services

AWS_SECRET_KEY.description: Access key for Amazon Web Services

MAVEN_CUSTOM_OPTS.description: Settings for Maven (Heroku specific - probably don't change)
